name: MagentoAdmin_MassCancelByStatus
description: Filters orders by Status on the Admin Orders grid, selects rows via the Select menu, and executes the Mass Action: Cancel on selected orders. Verifies completion by extracting the page for success indicators.

steps.description: Open the Magento Admin Orders grid
Set the Status filter to the provided value
Apply Filters to refresh the grid
Wait for the grid to refresh after applying filters
Open the Select menu for bulk selection controls
Select orders using the Select dropdown (e.g., 'Select All on This Page' or 'Select All'). Menu options are dynamic.
steps.task: From the grid's Select menu, choose {select_menu_option}

steps.description: Mass action menu items and confirmation modals are dynamic; apply Cancel to the current selection.
steps.task: In the Actions dropdown, click 'Cancel' for the selected orders and confirm any modal dialog if prompted

input_schema.name: status_filter
input_schema.description: Visible text of the Status filter to apply on the Orders grid

input_schema.name: select_menu_option
input_schema.description: Selection command from the 'Select' menu to choose which rows to target
